title: Aggressive young investors are helping keep a correction at bay, says JPMorgan
text:
Long COVID risks halved by dual vaccination, study finds

The risk of so-called long COVID drops nearly in half after a person receives two doses of coronavirus vaccine, according to a new study. See full story.

Apple loosens App Store payment rules for â€˜reader' apps in another concession to developers

In its second concession to developers and regulators in less than a week, Apple Inc. late Wednesday said it will allow developers like Netflix Inc. and Spotify Technology to provide customers a link to create a paid account that sidesteps Apple's in-app purchase commissions of up to 30%. See full story.

How do I claim Social Security from my ex's earnings?

Qualifying for Social Security spousal benefits -- even if you're divorced See full story.

Why renting a home might be the more responsible thing to do

Don't assume that owning a home is always better. In some circumstances and for some people, renting is the better choice. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

A personal financial plan is the key to achieving short- and long-term goals. See full story.
